Text:
This is my first attempt at a torrent.  I play with friends in CoH and they don't always have the same maps.  There approximately 670 maps and the most recent patch for the Blitz mod for ease of dl'ing.

With that said, yes there are some that are dups but are there in case not everyone has the same version.

Enjoy and I'll leave my home box seeding until it craps out or the grid goes down.
